lead_paragraph: The Preakness winner Bernardini and Bluegrass Cat, runner-up in the Kentucky Derby and the Belmont, will meet for the first time today in the $1 million Travers Stakes at Saratoga, with both 3-year-old colts coming off resounding victories. Bernardini is the even-money favorite in a field of seven, with Bluegrass Cat the second choice at 2-1.
snippet: The Preakness winner Bernardini and Bluegrass Cat, runner-up in the Kentucky Derby and the Belmont, will meet for the first time today in the $1 million Travers Stakes at Saratoga, with both 3-year-old colts coming off resounding victories....
